docs.lead_paragraph: BEFORE you put your money in companies whose promise is tied to some new product or developing technology, you'd better put up your defenses against securities fraud. That is the most powerful of several messages in the package of four articles highlighted on the cover of Worth magazine's April issue.

headline.main: Taking Promises of Profits With a Bigger Grain of Salt
